title: Position Constraint
description: A constraint that links the position with a source.

source.description: The index of the node constrains the node.

sourceSpace.description: The source node will be evaluated in this space.

sourceRotationOffset.description: rotation offset. quaternion x, y, z; w

destinationSpace.description: The destination node will be evaluated in this space.

destinationRotationOffset.description: rotation offset. quaternion x, y, z; w

freezeAxes.description: Axes be constrained by this constraint, in X-Y-Z order.
